GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.17 to before v4.9.318
GSD.description:
tcp: fix tcp_mtup_probe_success vs wrong snd_cwnd

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit 29e13f6b38f0816af2012e0725507754e8f4569c, it was introduced in version v2.6.17 by commit 5d424d5a674f782d0659a3b66d951f412901faee. For more details please see the references link.
